snippet: The period-instrument ensemble offered a program of Beethoven, Haydn and Witt in its season finale at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by period-instrument ensemble American Classical Orchestra at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The period-instrument ensemble offered a program of Beethoven, Haydn and Witt in its season finale at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.main: Review: American Classical Orchestra Takes on Friedrich Witt
headline.print_headline: Taking a Chance on Friedrich Witt
